title: Melbourne man charged over flashing
content:
A man has been charged after a teenage girl was flashed on a Melbourne street.

The 15-year-old girl was walking in Glen Waverley on Monday when a man exposed himself.

Police have charged a 25-year-old Wyndham Vale man with wilful obscene exposure and performing an indecent act before a child, and he will appear in Melbourne Magistrate's Court on October 3
